class.name: cob_env_model/PointCloudFilter
class.description: Nodelet for point cloud filtering (amplitude, confidence, tear-off, speckle)

class.name: cob_env_model/SegmentFieldOfView
class.description: Nodelet for field of view segmentation

class.name: cob_env_model/PcPublisher
class.description: A nodelet to convert an ipa_PointCloud to a ROS_PointCloud2 an republish.

class.name: cob_env_model/CPCVisualizer
class.description: A nodelet to visualize a custom ROS_PointCloud2.
